document_data.name: ''Theskan Anthology of Goblin Poetry''
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Theskan Anthology of Goblin Poetry''''' was a simple pamphlet-size [[chapbook]] that collected works of poetry by the [[goblin]]s of [[Thesk]]. {{quote|''I once met a wizard in [[Tammar]]''
''Who went and corrected me grammar''
'''e said I can't cast no spell''
'''til I enunciate well
''So I beat 'im to death with a hammer.''|Excerpt from ''Theskan Anthology of Goblin Poetry''}}
document_data.Description: The ''Anthology'' was filled with many lewd sketches.
document_data.History: In [[1492 DR]], a copy of ''Theskan Anthology of Goblin Poetry'' could be found within the camp of the [[Cult of the Absolute]] that took over the [[Shattered Sanctum]], once a temple of [[Selûne]]. The followers of the [[Absolute]] included numerous goblins.
